title: THE MANDALORIAN Trailer Breakdown, Plot Details, and More!
author: Think Story
comment: I've been informed that the yellow marking on the helmet is just the reflection. How embarassing! To the Sarlacc Pit I go!
The yellow marking on the helmet is just the reflection of the setting

It's such a minor detail but I LOVE that IG-11 is pointing his weapon in weird, unnatural ways because his arms can move the way a human's can't. A lot of sci-fi robots have that restriction and admittedly that's because of how many of them are people in suits. With IG-11's design they can go all-out and I hope he does some other crazy gun shenanigans like firing while spinning his torso 360 degrees.
He spiderman'd that dude right in half. I'm fuckin in!
that was quick! thanks Daddy for the great insight on the trailer 😬
description:
In this video we take a look at Disney's latest Star Wars TV show, "The Mandalorian," breaking down the trailer, plot details and everything we know so far.
